alert.note: Alert for Brown; Day; Marshall; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 31 at 3:05PM MDT until April 01 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Brown, Marshall, Day and Spink Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
